alert.note: Alert for Madison; Monroe; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 5:45PM CST until February 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and light snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one half inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Illinois. Portions of east central and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
